description: Get maximum audio performance with the V7 2.0 Performance Speaker System. Part of V7 Private Label’s new line of PC Speakers, the Performance Speaker offer crisp, clear sound coupled with 6w RMS output for solid audio. The streamlined speakers are encased in a glossy front and black wood casing with controls atop one tower to make audio control a cinch.
title: V7 A320P-N6 2.0 Performance PC Speaker System
